com.estimote.coresdk.recognition.packets

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.coresdk.recognition.packets.Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Beacon, ConfigurableDevice, Eddystone, EstimoteLocation, EstimoteTelemetry, Mirror, Nearable

    public abstract class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    General interface for all packets available for scan.
    Author:
    Pawel Dylag (pawel.dylag@estimote.com)
